# GitHub Pages Static Site

This directory contains the generated static HTML files for GitHub Pages deployment.

**⚠️ Do not edit files in this directory manually!**

Files in this directory are automatically generated by running:
```bash
php scripts/generate-static-site.php
```

To deploy:
1. Update the `$baseUrl` in `scripts/generate-static-site.php` with your GitHub Pages URL
2. Run the generator script
3. Commit and push the `gh-pages` directory
4. Enable GitHub Pages in your repository settings (Settings > Pages)

Or use GitHub Actions (automated deployment):
- The workflow in `.github/workflows/deploy-gh-pages.yml` will automatically generate and deploy on push to main branch
